entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
